data-operations.description: Import, export, and synchronization operations for health data.

pdf-export.description: Generates and downloads PDF reports of user's health data.
userFlow: User clicks 'Download Report' button in HealthDataSection.
System generates PDF report with current health metrics and charts.
PDF file is automatically downloaded to user's device.

POST /api/health-data/export/pdf.description: Generates a PDF report of the user's health data.

POST /api/health-data/import.description: Imports health data from uploaded files (Apple Health, Google Fit, etc.).

POST /api/health-data/native-sync.description: Synchronizes health data from native mobile health apps.
